## Matrix class

A matrix based on a vector (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Matrix 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(options)](./matrix-scan.matrix._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new Matrix (beta) |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [direction](./matrix-scan.matrix.direction.md) |  | [VectorDirection](./matrix-scan.vectordirection.md) | The initial direction the vector travels from the start corner across the matrix |
|  [fullVectorLength](./matrix-scan.matrix.fullvectorlength.md) |  | number | The full vector length for this matrix. Can not be set directly. calculated based on the width and height of the matrix. (beta) |
|  [height](./matrix-scan.matrix.height.md) |  | number | Height of the matrix |
|  [pattern](./matrix-scan.matrix.pattern.md) |  | [VectorPattern](./matrix-scan.vectorpattern.md) | The repeating partern the vector follows to create the matrix |
|  [start\_corner](./matrix-scan.matrix.start_corner.md) |  | [MatrixCorner](./matrix-scan.matrixcorner.md) | The corner of the matrix where the vector starts |
|  [subVectorCount](./matrix-scan.matrix.subvectorcount.md) |  | number | Gets or sets the sub vector count for this matrix. This will either be the width or height of the matrix, depending on the vector direction. (beta) |
|  [subVectorLength](./matrix-scan.matrix.subvectorlength.md) |  | number | The sub vector length for this matrix. The full vector needs to be divided in to smaller "sub" vectors which are laied out to cover the matrix. Each subvector will have the same length which will be wither the width or height of the matrix, depending on the vector direction. (beta) |
|  [width](./matrix-scan.matrix.width.md) |  | number | Width of the matrix |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getAllPositions()](./matrix-scan.matrix.getallpositions.md) |  | Return all value positions with the <code>x,y</code> coordinates in the matrix and thier <code>n</code> possition in the vector |
|  [getVectorIndex(x, y)](./matrix-scan.matrix.getvectorindex.md) |  | Return this 1D vector position of a value given it's 2D matrix coordinates (beta) |
|  [isBotomUp()](./matrix-scan.matrix.isbotomup.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a <b>bottom up</b> pattern (beta) |
|  [isBtmStart()](./matrix-scan.matrix.isbtmstart.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a pattern starting at the <b>bottom</b> (beta) |
|  [isLefStart()](./matrix-scan.matrix.islefstart.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a pattern starting on the <b>left</b> (beta) |
|  [isLeftRight()](./matrix-scan.matrix.isleftright.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a <b>left to right </b> pattern (beta) |
|  [isRightLeft()](./matrix-scan.matrix.isrightleft.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a <b>right to left</b> pattern (beta) |
|  [isRitStart()](./matrix-scan.matrix.isritstart.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a pattern starting on the <b>right</b> (beta) |
|  [isTopDown()](./matrix-scan.matrix.istopdown.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a <b>top down</b> patterm (beta) |
|  [isTopStart()](./matrix-scan.matrix.istopstart.md) |  | Returns whether this matrix has a pattern starting at the <b>top</b> (beta) |
